app_description: BEST QUALITY PDF TRANSLATOR EDITOR Introducing the ultimate PDF Translator Editor: Instantly translate and edit PDFs and more in a few taps! Easily translate PDFs and various file formats across 136 languages while preserving formatting and layout. Seamlessly access translations from any app with our powerful app extension. Key Features: Translate PDFs images Word Excel and PowerPoint. Edit PDF text and images using the PDF Editor. Translate multilingual PDFs into a single language. Choose your preferred translation engine Google or Microsoft . Unlimited page and MB translation in seconds. Language Detection for effortless translation. Scan convert and translate photos pptx excel Word and PDFs. Document renaming sharing and Dark Mode support. Bonus document viewer for various file formats. Say goodbye to tedious copy pasting into Google Translate. Transform the way you handle document translations on your iPhone and iPad download now!
